feature.label: Adlsearch Feature
feature.description:
ADL Search allows one to search through the files and Folders of a downloaded Filelist. And let files that are interesting be sorted out automatically.
This is very helpful for OPs for example by sorting all files that contain "porn" or "xxx" into a folder called suspicious checking filelists becomes easier.
